subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Commissioner David Stern cast doubt over a deal in the works to allow Coach Doc Rivers to leave the Celtics for the Clippers, citing a violation of N.B.A. rules.
snippet: Commissioner David Stern cast doubt over a deal in the works to allow Coach Doc Rivers to leave the Celtics for the Clippers, citing a violation of N.B.A. rules.
